notifications.allUpToDate: All enabled modules are up to date.

apiKeyRequired.message: Checking for updates requires an API Key. Please configure it in the {link}module settings{/link}.

field.label: API Key
field.hint: You can find an appropriate API key in your license.mjs file.

import.label: Import
import.hint: Choose or drag-and-drop your license.mjs file to auto-fill the API Key. This can be found by right-clicking on the FoundryVTT application and clicking "Browse Application Data". Navigate into the dist/core/ to find license.mjs.

messages.extractionError: Could not find API Key in the file.
